reviewText: The best instructional DVD I've gotten yet. It perfectly matches my chord-melody finger picking style. His instruction is very competent and easy to follow. Working on "Ain't Misbehavin'" now I just need about 6 months to get it right.
I loved this video. Pat Donohue is an excellent teacher, keeps it simple and imparts a great deal of his knowledge of music and guitar playing while keeping it funny and entertaining.
You get first rate instruction that anyone with average skill and an interest in learning these eat songs can follow.
